snippet.title: [Level 1 Stats] Valkyria Chronicles 3 E2 - Extra Missions: The Looming Nightmare - 2 Turns
snippet.description:
Mission Name: The Looming Nightmare
Mission Objectives: Hold defensive line for 4 turns OR all enemy units defeated
Restrictions: Only Riela and Imca may deploy
Grade: ★★★★★
Ace Name: Kumagar the Immortal
Ace Drop 1: Frist
Ace Drop 2: None
Ranking: S: 3 | A: 4

This is a DLC mission that is not included in the "E2" version of Valkyria Chronicles 3 and therefore, entirely in Japanese. Translations may not be 100% accurate but it is at least something to go off.

--------------------

https://twitter.com/LouffeVC
